description: The faster participants click the images, the more points they collect. Participants are ranked in a leaderboard.

presentation.body:
What the activation does

A leaderboard speed-clicking game where the fastest participant receives a prize.

How to use the activation at your event

Use the Whack a Mole to activate your audience before, during or after events with a fun game!

maxSeries.label: Number of Leaderboard Rounds
maxSeries.description: Select the number of leaderboard rounds. When the leaderboard round countdown runs out a new round begins.

enableMaxRoundsPerSeries.label: Limit Quiz Replays
enableMaxRoundsPerSeries.description: Activate this option to limit the number of games a participant can play within a round.

maxRoundsPerSeries.label: Maximum Games to be Played
maxRoundsPerSeries.help: Set the number of tries a user has to replay this activation.

seriesDuration.label: Leaderboard Round Countdown
seriesDuration.help:
When the countdown ends, the leaderboard of this particular round freezes. Participants can no longer play in this round. If you have selected multiple leaderboard rounds a new round will start with a new leaderboard. If you add a prize with the win criterium "Top Ranking
 to this activation, the winners are picked when the countdown ends.

challengeDuration.label: Game Duration
challengeDuration.description: Select the time a user has to play the game.
